headline: Steel Dynamics (STLD) Falls More Steeply Than Broader Market: What Investors Need to Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Steel Dynamics (STLD) stood at $130.03, denoting a -2.82% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: U.S.-China Trade Deal Includes 55% Tariff, But What Else?
summary: The U.S.-China trade deal hikes tariffs on Chinese goods to 55% while rare earths are settled, President Trump said. What will China get?
